name: Money Tree 2 Idle Tycoon Games
description:
Does money grow on trees? In this idle tycoon money game, YESSS!!! In Money Tree 2, you can be a millionaire cultivating your own money tree. Yeah, you read right. On the clicker game way, you'll start with a small seeding that gives you some nickels and dimes, but as a tycoon game, in moments later, you'll have a giant money tree and earn money to be a millionaire won't be a problem anymore.

You are one step away from being rich; all you need now is... Clicker... And you make lots of money to fill your pockets. It doesn't matter how high the dollar will be; in this idle tycoon game, you, like a good adventure capitalist, you can hire gardeners, kids, llamas, and even the president. (How come the president? In a money game. Yes, We Can!)

I always dream of being a millionaire like my uncle!... He's dreaming too. Now we're comparing who's has the highest money tree and who's is richest (I'm a better adventure capitalist than him, but don't tell him). Poor to rich, simple like that, in an idle clicker game way!

How to Play
Money Clicker Game: To make your money tree grows and gives you more and more money, swipe or click in your money tree. Use the money to buy helpers, fertilizers, and power-ups.

After this crazy rich idle tycoon game, I've never hard work anymore,

Highlights
GROW - Cultivate your money tree for always growing as much as you clicker more money you'll earn. (This is clicker game baby!)
POTENCIALIZE - Adventure capitalists reinvest their money, so do you! Use your money to potentialize and grow your money tree faster.
BREAKING NEWS! - Is Bill Gates a reptilian? What about the boy who eats a money tree seed, a money tree will grow inside him? These and others on Channel 2, the news that will cover the crazy story about your money tree.

Yeah, I know what you are thinking, and the answer is Cars and Safes are the fruits of your money tree. So take care when to hug a money tree.

Download Money Tree 2: Crazy Rich Idle Tycoon Millionaire and have fun!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
publishers: Tapps Games - Jogos Eletronicos, Unipessoal, Lda
